Material used.Material Name: TSM1, SH-SY5Y, HEK293, Mouse Embryonic Fibroblasts
Material used.Description: The experiments were conducted using TSM1 neurons, SH-SY5Y human neuroblastoma cells, HEK293 cells, and Mouse Embryonic Fibroblasts.

Readout description.Result Description: The D149A mutation fully blocks DJ-1 cleavage by recombinant caspase-6, leading to a loss of function.
The L166P mutation destabilizes DJ-1 and renders the protein prone to rapid degradation, leading to a loss of function.

Biological replicates.Description: Multiple independent experiments were performed to ensure reproducibility.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type DJ-1 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: PRISM software was used for one-way analysis of variance or unpaired Student’s test.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Caspase-3 activity and p53 expression levels in control cells.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Increased caspase-3 activity and p53 expression levels in mutant cells.

Material used.Material Name: TSM1, SH-SY5Y, HEK293, Mouse Embryonic Fibroblasts
Material used.Description: The experiments were conducted using TSM1 neurons, SH-SY5Y human neuroblastoma cells, HEK293 cells, and Mouse Embryonic Fibroblasts.

Readout description.Result Description: The D149A mutation fully blocks DJ-1 cleavage by recombinant caspase-6, leading to a loss of function.
The L166P mutation destabilizes DJ-1 and renders the protein prone to rapid degradation, leading to a loss of function.

Biological replicates.Description: Multiple independent experiments were performed to ensure reproducibility.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type DJ-1 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: PRISM software was used for one-way analysis of variance or unpaired Student’s test.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Relative mRNA levels in control cells.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Decreased relative mRNA levels in mutant cells.
